sentences.en: a pair of faded jeans
sentences.cn: 一条褪了色的牛仔裤

sentences.en: All colour fades – especially under the impact of direct sunlight.
sentences.cn: 所有颜色都会褪色–尤其是在直射阳光的影响下。

sentences.en: Britain's dream of herself began to fade.
sentences.cn: 不列颠民族的梦想开始渐渐幻灭。

sentences.en: Dead-head roses as the blooms fade.
sentences.cn: 玫瑰花开败后就把枯花摘去。

sentences.en: He slid a control to fade out the music.
sentences.cn: 他滑动控制器，让音乐声渐渐减弱。

sentences.en: Hopes of a peace settlement are beginning to fade.
sentences.cn: 达成和平协议的希望日渐渺茫。

sentences.en: My resentment of her slowly began to fade.
sentences.cn: 我对她的怨恨开始渐渐消退了。

sentences.en: No matter how soft the light is, it still fades carpets and curtains in every room.
sentences.cn: 不论光线多么柔和，它仍然会使每个房间的地毯和窗帘褪色。

sentences.en: Over the years her beauty had faded a little.
sentences.cn: 岁月流逝，她的美貌已略逊当年。

sentences.en: Prospects for peace had already started to fade.
sentences.cn: 和平的前景已经开始日渐暗淡。

sentences.en: The colour in this material does not fade.
sentences.cn: 这布料不褪色.

sentences.en: The colours fade into one another.
sentences.cn: 各种颜色退得分不清了.

sentences.en: The colours gently fade each time you wash the shirt.
sentences.cn: 衬衣每洗一次都会褪点色。

sentences.en: the fading evening light
sentences.cn: 渐暗的暮色

sentences.en: The measures are little more than window dressing that will fade fast once investors take a hard look at them.
sentences.cn: 这些措施也就是装装门面，一旦投资者认真探究，就会原形毕露。

sentences.en: The sun had faded the curtains.
sentences.cn: 太阳把窗帘晒得褪了色。

sentences.en: The truck pulled away, and she listened to the rattling noises fade down the lane.
sentences.cn: 卡车开走了，她听见卡车的隆隆声越来越远。

sentences.en: These sunproof curtains will not fade.
sentences.cn: 这些耐晒的窗帘不褪色.

sentences.en: They watched the familiar mountains fade into the darkness.
sentences.cn: 他们看着熟悉的群山渐渐隐没到黑夜当中。

sentences.en: We fade in the closing music as the hero rides off into the sunset.
sentences.cn: 随着主角朝着落日骑马而去,我们渐渐加大结尾音乐的音量.

sentences.en: We watched the harbour and then the coastline fade away into the morning mist.
sentences.cn: 我们凝望着港口，只见海岸线渐渐隐于晨雾之中。

sentences.en: Will the colour in this material fade?
sentences.cn: 这种料子褪色 吗 ?

sentences.en: Will this cloth fade?
sentences.cn: 这布掉色 吗 ?

phrases.tran_cn: 渐强：使逐渐出现或被听见。用于电影或电视的图象或声音
渐弱：使逐渐消失。用于电影或电视的图象或声音

trans.tran_cn: [电影][电视] 淡出；[电影][电视] 淡入
变暗淡，褪色，逐渐消失，逐渐减弱，衰退，衰弱

trans.tran_en: to lose colour and brightness, or to make something do this
